resources.string: Only popup emails from phone contacts
Only popup emails from starred contacts
Only popup emails when the keyguard is on

Author: Bao-Long Nguyen-Trong
 
 Email Popup is a simple utility that displays a short dialog every time an email is received.
 
 You can select how long the popup stays on and you can configure filtering so that only the emails important to you popup.
 
 Email Popup is is great for you leave your phone on your desk which working or studying. Email Popup can also be used with the phone mounted on the car dashboard which you are driving.
 
 Email Popup only works with K-9 Mail v1.106 and higher.
 
 For comments and feedback, feel free to email me at email-popup@blntsoft.com
 
 Check out the app blog for news:
 http://www.blntsoft.com/category/email-popup/
